name: Swell of Growth
originalText: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: Putting a land onto the battlefield this way is not the same as playing a land. Swell of Growth doesn’t affect how many lands you can play from your hand during your turn.

text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
